summary: Changes one of the girl's outfits into the male model
descriptionHtml:
I could never picture badass warriors, tough-as-nails commanders, or ruthless leaders like Uthgerd, Mjoll, Rikke or Maven running around in a pretty little girly dress as a child. So here is a quick little mod that changes one of the female child outfits to the male model.
For the next generation of female warriors!

No *.esp, so no burden on your load order.

================================================
Installation:

Download with Manager, activate Mod, and you're done. :-)
author: Wuestenratte
